title: Fallen Nation
description: Team Knight Rider stops a US General's plans to take over the country by destroying a nuclear missile aimed at Washington D.C. before it enters the earth's atmosphere.

title: The Magnificent T.K.R.
description: When a former French government official, Jean-Claude Laval, steals a top-secret device form the US government, Team Knight Rider must follow him into a Mexican town to recover it.

title: The 'A' List
description: Trek and Erica go undercover and discover that a corporate giant is responsible for brainwashing and killing some of the world's leading technological geniuses.

title: K.R.O.
description: TKR is called in to stop a deranged Knight Foundation Ferrari sports car that escaped while being transported to Maryland Industries for reprogramming.

title: Inside Traitor
description: When Erica goes undercover with an elite group of thieves, Team Knight Rider questions her loyalty to F.L.A.G.

title: Choctaw L-9
description: Team Knight Rider must recover the stolen Choctaw L-9, the government's latest war bird. In the process, Kyle is suspended as the team leader and the rest of the team must work to clear his name while outsmarting their new leader, FBI agent Kobak.

title: Everything to Fear
description: When Jenny's abducted, the team goes searching for her. Duke and Beast follow her signal and discover the man who grabbed her. The man demands that Duke bring him where he wants to go. He takes away Duke's communicator and they go off carrying a powerful explosive in the back. The team tries to find Jenny and Duke when he doesn't call in.

title: Sky One
description: Terrorists hijack SkyOne and threaten Team Knight Rider with a deadly gas stolen from the Gulf War.

title: The Iron Maiden
description: Team Knight Rider must stop three super powered Exo-Troopers under the control of the evil Starr.

title: Oil & Water
description: When cars begin to spontaneously explode, TKR discovers that it is part of German inventor/artist Otto Bruckheimer's diabolical plot.

title: Et Tu Dante
description: While Team Knight Rider works to stop a mysterious mad man from bombing local Washington D.C. historical sites, the TKR cars are infected by a virus that makes them turn on their drivers.

title: The Bad Seed
description: Team Knight Rider must stop Dr. Toma from infecting the world's biggest rivers with the deadly compound he has been making in his secret lab on the island of San Cartega.

title: Out of the Past
description: Team Knight Rider is shocked when they find out that Kyle is wanted for robbery in South America, and must travel deep into the jungle to locate him and find out the truth.

title: The Return of Megaman
description: A strategic weapon capable of releasing a neutron blast that can wipe out millions is on the loose in New Mexico.

title: Angels in Chains
description: Jenny has been accused of stealing confidential files and Team Knight Rider must clear her of all charges.

title: The Blonde Woman
description: When Team Knight Rider captures who they believe to be the infamous assassin, Eve, they discover it's a man posing as Eve. They must infiltrate an exclusive party to locate the real assassin and identify the man they hold captive before the real Eve kills her next victim.

title: The Ixtafa Affair
description: When Jenny encounters an old boyfriend, she discovers that he is being coerced into rescuing a Guatemalan drug lord from a remote mountain top prison.

title: Home Away from Home
description: When Team Knight Rider loses the infamous hacker Cork Flemming to the KGB, the team must travel to the mysteriously "perfect" town of Rockwell, Iowa to locate her.

title: EMP
description: A device that can shut down sophisticated electronic equipment is stolen and Team Knight Rider must get it back.

title: Apocalypse Maybe
description: Team Knight Rider must stop the Reverend Ransom from using his seismic weapon to destroy Las Vegas.

title: Spy Girls
description: Team Knight Rider must work with a team of three women in order to locate a stolen microfiche and stop the production of a dangerous nerve gas.

title: Legion of Doom
description: Team Knight Rider must track down Mobius after he frees several of their enemies out of prison.
